name: Computer Solutions Group, Inc.
description:
Our typical customer has 20-300 workstations, is a professional service business, and relies heavily on e-mail, the internet, and their mission critical computer network. 
Our clients hire us because they do not want to incur the overhead and the cost of a full-time IT staff, and they don’t want to burden their employees with the responsibility of troubleshooting the entire company network.
CSG is a 2015 Inc. 5000: America's Fastest Growing Companies Honoree for 2015
